title.native: 妃教育から逃げたい私
title.english: I Want to Escape from Princess Lessons

description:
Leticia Dorman, daughter of a duke, is less than thrilled to be engaged to a crown prince. Betrothed since childhood and trained to be queen, she always hoped Prince Clarke would fall for someone else one day. So when he shows up at a ball with another woman, Lettie excitedly retreats to the countryside to start her new life—only for Clarke to appear, determined to win her heart.

(Source: Crunchyroll)
synonyms: Saya Ingin Melarikan Diri dari Pendidikan Sang Putri

tags.name: Torture
tags.description: The act of deliberately inflicting severe pain or suffering upon another individual or oneself as a punishment or with a specific purpose.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Arranged Marriage
tags.description: Features two characters made to marry each other, usually by their family.

tags.name: Royal Affairs
tags.description: Features nobility, alliances, arranged marriage, succession disputes, religious orders and other elements of royal politics.

tags.name: Shoujo
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult females.

tags.name: Ojou-sama
tags.description: Features a wealthy, high-class, oftentimes stuck up and demanding female character.

tags.name: Foreign
tags.description: Partly or completely set in a country outside the country of origin.

tags.name: Fishing
tags.description: Centers around the sport of fishing.

node.description: _Note: Not to be confused with the [animator](https://anilist.co/staff/151217/)._

__Alma Mater:__ Toyo University

__[Website](https://www.yukihayashi.net/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hayayu1231)__

__Introduction:__
Yuuki Hayashi is a Japanese composer and arranger affiliated with Legendoor, who used to be a rhythmic gymnast

__Biography:__
His history in music began in university when he started creating music pieces for rhythmic gymnasts as a hobby for 5000 yen a piece. When he started getting requests from other universities for his music, his interest in music producing grew. After graduation, he was taught music for 6 months by a rhythmic gymnastics music producer, and now, he handles music for various sports. He also arranges music for dance, athletic competitions, companies, independent movies and recently, TV dramas and anime.

(Source: MyAnimeList, edited)

[Website](https://dialogue-music.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/DIALOGUE_staff) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/dialogue_staff) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/c/DIALOGUEOfficialChannel) | [TikTok](https://www.tiktok.com/@dialogue_official)

DIALOGUE+ is a voice actress unit composed of the following members:

- [Yurina Uchiyama](https://anilist.co/staff/204404/Yurina-Uchiyama)
- [Nene Hieda](https://anilist.co/staff/163903/Nene-Hieda)
- [Kyouka Moriya](https://anilist.co/staff/164774/Kyouka-Moriya)
- [Yuuna Ogata](https://anilist.co/staff/190470/Yuuna-Ogata)
- [Ayaka Takamura](https://anilist.co/staff/204409/Ayaka-Takamura)
- [Satsuki Miyahara](https://anilist.co/staff/204411/Satsuki-Miyahara)
- [Mayu Iizuka](https://anilist.co/staff/166401/Mayu-Iizuka)
- [Manatsu Murakami](https://anilist.co/staff/204420/Manatsu-Murakami)

__Height:__ 173 cm
__Skills & Abilities:__ Kendo

[Profile (Pony Canyon)](https://www.ponycanyon.co.jp/artist/31356600) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/black_fukuyama)

Fukuyama released his debut music album "Romantic World 31" on his birthday (November 26) in 2009, his second album "Love Letters 2: Paris Romantic" on July 21, 2010, his third album "Fukuyama Jun, Ai wo Utau!" on May 25, 2011, and his fourth album "Love Letter 3 ~Matsuri no Kuni de~" on May 22, 2013. He also appeared in a 2009 romantic comedy movie Fujoshi Kanojo in a cameo role.

**Non-anime roles:**
- [Joker](https://anilist.co/character/121590/Ren-Amamiya) - Persona 5
- Renya Goutou - 13 Sentinels: Aegis Rim
- [Camu](https://anilist.co/character/278324/Camu) - Punishing: Gray Raven
- [Kamui](https://anilist.co/character/259960) - Punishing: Gray Raven
- Vyn Richter - Tears of Themis
- Martin - Rune Factory 5
- Hugo - Zenless Zone Zero
- Logos - Arknights

__[Website](http://kandajohn.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/johnkanda_pgr)__

__John Kanda__ is a Japanese composer, guitarist and member of five-piece rock band [PENGUIN RESEARCH](https://anilist.co/staff/120093/PENGUIN-RESEARCH)

__[Website](http://kandajohn.jp/)__ | __[Twitter](https://twitter.com/johnkanda_pgr)__

__John Kanda__ is a Japanese composer, guitarist and member of five-piece rock band [PENGUIN RESEARCH](https://anilist.co/staff/120093/PENGUIN-RESEARCH)

__[Artist Profile (Scoop Music)](https://www.scoop.co.jp/creator/detail.php?cd=10)__

__Shin Furuya__ is a Japanese lyricist.
Masato Nakayama is a composer and former member of the music production group Elements Garden.

__Likes:__ Fried Chicken and Clams
__Dislikes:__ Tomatoes and Natto

__Introduction:__
Tomoya Tabuchi is a Japanese musician, lyricist, bassist, composer and arranger. He is in charge of the bass and chorus for the three-piece rock band [UNISON SQUARE GARDEN](https://anilist.co/staff/119406/Unison-Square-Garden), and for the rock band [THE KEBABS](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/THE_KEBABS), he also takes part in the [Q-MHz](https://ja.wikipedia.org/wiki/Q-MHz) music production team.

__Biography:__
Tomoya is the same age as the two other UNISON SQUARE GARDEN members, Kousuke Saito (斎藤宏介) who is also a high school and university classmate, and Suzuki Takao (鈴木貴雄) who is an elementary school classmate. In elementary school, he was obsessed with soccer, to the point that he'd become a "soccer boy". His future dream at the time, was to become a junior league soccer player. Band member Suzuki Takao participated in the same soccer club, as well. When he was in fifth grade of elementary school, he had to move from Funabashi City, Chiba to Setagaya-ku, Tokyo due to his father's work.

In later years he graduated from the Faculty of Political Science and Economics at Waseda University. His specialized field is finance theory.
